firstNightReminder: The Detective points to two players. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for whether one of those players is the Mastermind.
otherNightReminder: The Detective points to two players. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for whether one of those players is the Mastermind.
name: Detective
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: you learn if either is the Mastermind. There is a good player that registers as the Mastermind to you.

otherNightReminder: The previously protected player is no longer protected. The Martial Artist points to a player not themself. Mark that player 'Protected'.
name: Martial Artist
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself). They are safe from the Mastermind tonight.

name: Hope
ability: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

firstNightReminder: Show the character token of an Outsider in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
name: Literary Girl
ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)

name: Biker Leader
ability: You are safe from the Mastermind.

otherNightReminder: If the Programmer died tonight: The Programmer points to a player. Show that player’s character token.
name: Programmer
ability: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.

name: Affluent Progeny
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Mastermind, they die.

otherNightReminder: The Mastermind points to a player. That player dies. If the Mastermind chose themselves: Replace the character of 1 alive Traitor with a spare Mastermind token. Show the 'You are' card, then the Mastermind token.
name: Mastermind
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Traitor becomes the Mastermind.
